lg.l: Meek clematis; Clematis. Pikiarero (Clematis forsteri) is a climbing plant found in forest habitats throughout Aotearoa New Zealand, which produces large numbers of scented, star-shaped flowers. tree-dweller; child of dew;
Slow-trailing stars, or showers of misty suns,—
Whence is the hand thou reachest wistfully,
Feeling, on earth, for something not of earth?—
Lo, is this Bethel, Bethel. The biblical patriarch, Jacob, had a dream at Bethel of angels scaling a ladder that extended from the earth to heaven (Genesis 28:10-22). and the gate of Heaven?
Art thou the golden ladder, whereon pass
God’s angels up and down continually?
Ev’n now (God’s thoughts are angels) one descends;—
A pure gold petal flutters to my feet.
